greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of (e-1)/(e+1).
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
formula: Equals 2 * Sum_{k>=1} (2^(2*k)-1)*B(2*k)/(2*k)!, where B(2*k) = A000367(k)/A002445(k) are the Bernoulli numbers. - _Amiram Eldar_, Nov 25 2020
program: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 20080); x=tanh(1/2)*10; for (n=0, 20000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b160327.txt", n, " ", d)); }
results.author: _Harry J. Smith_, May 09 2009
